long.am,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
Unlock a superior browsing experience with DeepL for Chrome, your go-to for effortless AI translations and writing assistance. Trusted by millions across the globe, DeepL delivers unmatched accuracy and fluency, making communication seamless. Whether for professional or personal use, our extension integrates smoothly into your routine, eliminating the need to switch between apps or copy and paste. Discover a world where understanding and engaging in multiple languages is just a click away.

Discover DeepLâ€™s core capabilities

ğŸŒ DeepL Translator: Instantly understand and communicate in over 30 languages with the ability to translate texts, full pages, and even automate website translations with a DeepL Pro subscription. Ensure consistency and accuracy across all your translations with DeepL's glossary feature, enabling customization at scale for your business's internal and external communications. Choose from an extensive list of languages for translation, including English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Portuguese, Japanese, and many more.

âœï¸ DeepL Write: Take your writing in English and German to the next level (with more languages coming soon). Craft well-structured texts tailored to your audience and objectives, with impeccable grammar and clarity for impactful emails, presentations, reports, and more.

ğŸš€ Powerful integrations for professionals
Google Workspace: Transform your Google Workspace experience with DeepLâ€™s integration, allowing for direct translations and writing assistance in Gmail, Google Docs, Google Slidesâ€”with Google Sheets coming soon!
Zendesk: DeepL Pro Advanced and Ultimate subscribers can integrate DeepL with Zendesk to translate tickets and Live Chats.
Social and messaging platforms: Extend your global reach on Twitter, WhatsApp, and LinkedIn. DeepL enhances your social media interactions, ensuring your message resonates worldwide.

Why DeepL?
Unmatched accuracy: Rely on DeepL's industry-leading AI language technology for precise translations and confident communication.
Simplified global communication: Instantly translate and refine text while reading and writingâ€”without leaving your browser.
Enhanced productivity: Use quick shortcuts and automatic translations to save time and focus on what matters most.

Key information

ğŸ¤ Subscriptions: Start with our free browser extension or unlock full features with DeepL Pro and DeepL Write Pro. Learn more at deepl.com/pro.

ğŸ” Data security
Your data security is our top priority. Per our terms and conditions at deepl.com/en/pro-license, both DeepL Pro and DeepL Write Pro do not store or use your translations and texts to enhance our service, allowing you to securely translate and refine content containing personal data. However, the free version of our service may use submitted texts to improve DeepL algorithms for all users and should not be used for processing personal data. Learn more about our robust security measures and commitment to privacy at deepl.com/pro-data-security.

Ready to break down language barriers?

DeepL voor Chrome is de ideale AI-tool voor het vertalen en herschrijven van teksten in uw browser. Miljoenen mensen van over de hele wereld maken gebruik van onze producten om hoogwaardige teksten en natuurlijk klinkende vertalingen te produceren. Onze extensie is geschikt voor zakelijk en persoonlijk gebruik en kan met gemak geÃ¯ntegreerd worden in uw dagelijkse routine zonder heen-en-weer-gekopieer tussen verschillende apps. Ontdek een wereld zonder taalbarriÃ¨res.

Ontdek de mogelijkheden van DeepL

ğŸŒ DeepL Translator: Vertaal webteksten voortaan met gemak van en naar meer dan 30 verschillende talen of kies voor DeepL Pro om automatisch vertalingen te maken van hele websites. Heeft u bovendien behoefte aan meer controle tijdens het vertalen? Maak dan gebruik van onze woordenlijst-functie om het taalgebruik in al uw interne en externe communicatie te standaardiseren.
